title: bug: long-running integration tests failed
body:
The heavy (long-running) integration tests have failed. This indicates a regression in Foundry.

Check the [heavy integration tests workflow page](https://github.com/foundry-rs/foundry/actions/runs/7268086276
) for details.

This issue was raised by the workflow at `.github/workflows/heavy-integration.yml`.

```
690216:2023-11-17T22:36:54.1427483Z [FAIL. Reason: backend: failed while inspecting: Database error: failed to get account for 0x6aA67B755Bb54052e9E844f089B10d0907108118: TimeoutError] test_fixedTermLifecycle() (gas: 0)
690264:2023-11-17T22:36:54.1444391Z [FAIL. Reason: backend: failed while inspecting: Database error: failed to get storage for 0x24617612DeC91855e126e6330580425F6A262ee9 at 57325983823405042610574826940244905858686394239220627990387302826400503007031: TimeoutError] test_openAndFixedTermLifecycle() (gas: 0)
690312:2023-11-17T22:36:54.1472773Z [FAIL. Reason: backend: failed while inspecting: Database error: failed to get storage for 0x00e0C1ea2085e30E5233E98CFA940ca8cbB1b0b7 at 11061507200779268417998082858305574639797479722430251207676150210642773430152: TimeoutError] test_openTermOnboardLifecycle() (gas: 0)
2756068:2023-11-17T22:38:06.3105311Z [FAIL. Reason: setup failed: backend: failed while inspecting: Database error: failed to get storage for 0x36a7350309B2Eb30F3B908aB0154851B5ED81db0 at 4: TimeoutError] setUp() (gas: 0)
3219380:2023-11-17T22:38:22.0337311Z [FAIL. Reason: setup failed: backend: failed while inspecting: Database error: failed to get storage for 0x804a6F5F667170F545Bf14e5DDB48C70B788390C at 91908817273793061004014931225575713380283696824813213781539959964488809398750: TimeoutError] setUp() (gas: 0)
3219419:2023-11-17T22:38:22.0392672Z [FAIL. Reason: setup failed: backend: failed while inspecting: Database error: failed to get account for 0x562374079a8A07417ec4A69d5d52F9CBa796d364: TimeoutError] setUp() (gas: 0)
5023588:2023-11-17T22:56:27.1295395Z [FAIL. Reason: setup failed: backend: failed while inspecting: Database error: failed to get storage for 0x373BDCf21F6a939713d5DE94096ffdb24A406391 at 7: TimeoutError] setUp() (gas: 0)
6532327:2023-11-17T22:57:15.0405909Z [FAIL. Reason: setup failed: backend: failed while inspecting: Database error: failed to get storage for 0x804a6F5F667170F545Bf14e5DDB48C70B788390C at 91908817273793061004014931225575713380283696824813213781539959964488809398750: TimeoutError] setUp() (gas: 0)
6532340:2023-11-17T22:57:15.0419704Z [FAIL. Reason: backend: failed while inspecting: Database error: failed to get storage for 0xd3cd37a7299B963bbc69592e5Ba933388f70dc88 at 19938583465352020147871751190973633763163532011986798075201173091876229240530: TimeoutError] test_fixedTermLifecycle() (gas: 0)
6534917:2023-11-17T22:57:15.1610277Z [FAIL. Reason: backend: failed while inspecting: Database error: failed to get storage for 0xC02aaA39b223FE8D0A0e5C4F27eAD9083C756Cc2 at 33137364665554154053365516635977551332077242286704735952980841609489080611844: TimeoutError] test_openAndFixedTermLifecycle() (gas: 0)
6586051:2023-11-17T22:57:19.1753960Z [FAIL. Reason: backend: failed while inspecting: Database error: failed to get storage for 0xFfF9A1CAf78b2e5b0A49355a8637EA78b43fB6c3 at 17100111882787799588664245527829203100593826646542571046310977513458053601910: TimeoutError] test_openTermOnboardLifecycle() (gas: 0)
```

I'll just keep this one open so it doesn't spam the tracker.
